name: Slimer (WexDex)
description:
a Game made with LÖVE 11.3, for Weekly Game Jam - Week 177

a Puzzle-Platformer where you play with a Slime which sticks to sticky walls solving given levels by reaching the strawberry

Red outlined objects will kill.

you stick to Green outlined objects.

there are switches with open doors with the same color (Doors can be Deadly or Sticky too)

Controls :

- AD Keys - Move

- S - Interact

- Y - Jump

- R - Restart

- N - Next Song

- P - Shuffle

- I - Increase Volum

 - O - Decrease Volume

this is just a demo with fewer levels :(

INFO : If you encounter bugs feel free to comment it out, im sure there are bugs.

to Play just extract and then Run the "play.bat" file.

Thanks for playing!
